name: 'NSF Thurmont' Online Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Josh saw Donna in the operating room, what was the first thing she wrote to him on a pad of paper?
questions.explanation:
Nice hat.

	The surgeon told Josh that Donna wanted to see him before they operated on her. When he went into the OR, Donna wrote to him on a pad of paper. The hat she was referring to was the paper hat he wore along with the surgical smock. The second thing she wrote to him was "Scared".

questions.text: Before boarding Marine One, who did Toby find out got sick when they flew?
questions.explanation:
Kate.

	When Toby found out that Kate got airsick when she flew, he suggested she sit near Will.

questions.text: When CJ asked Will if he had s'mores with strategic planning the night before at Camp David, Will said they also had ______ with missile planning.
questions.explanation:
Marshmallows.

	CJ told Will that the the kind of horror stories the President likes to tell by the campfire has to do with the Crusades. When they got off the phone, CJ told Carol that they were feeding people food with the consistency of industrial sealant.

questions.text: Where did Colin tell Josh he grew up?
questions.explanation:
Belfast.

	Colin was the photojournalist that Donna met in "Gaza". He joined Josh in Germany where Donna was sent after the explosion.

questions.text: What did Toby suggest the President was going to do with the second Nobel Prize he would get if the peace summit happened?
options: Display them on the Oval Office desk
Lug them around on Air Force One to show off
questions.explanation:
Use them as book ends.

	Toby (to Leo): "What's the President doing, Leo? A summit? He's already got a Nobel Prize. What's he need a second one for, book ends?"

questions.text: Who did Leo say this to, "You're not changing the course of history"?
questions.explanation:
Kate.

	Kate was telling Leo that she should have anticipated that Chairman Farad would invite himself to Camp David.

questions.text: When Will ran past Kate, how many miles did he say he had the legs for?
questions.explanation:
5.

	Kate told him to buy a carton of cigarettes and next time he could stay in bed.

questions.text: When Toby and Josh were talking, what did Josh call the nurse that made him turn off his cell phone in the hospital?
questions.explanation:
Nurse Ratched.

	Nurse Ratched was a character in "One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest". This is the second time Nurse Ratched has been mentioned on "The West Wing". In season three, CJ referred to herself as Nurse Ratchett after she warned him not to put messages on a website bulletin board.

questions.text: Did Israeli Prime Minister Zahavy agree to a peace summit?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	He told President Bartlet if Chairman Farad had Nasan arrested for the bombings then he would agree to talk with him.

questions.text: Who was with Donna when she woke up after surgery?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh was watching the news report on the arrest of Nasan when Donna opened her eyes. She was surprised that he was still at the hospital.
